going to start with the steering wheel
which is just bizarre first off it's
tiny it's really small and it isn't
circular it's sort of square at the top
and the bottom like in a formula one car
or in a ferrari except this is a pujo
compact crossover it is very unusual but
there's some functional reasons behind
it the steering wheel is especially
short on top because the instrument
panel the gauge cluster is above where
you look so unlike in a traditional car
where you look below the upper rim of
the steering wheel to see what speed
you're going and all the other stuff and
this thing you look above it so it's
right in your field of vision this is
actually a really good idea but by
implementing this idea they gave you a
very small steering wheel like you're at
a race car or something i put my hand on
it almost takes up the entire side of
the wheel it's bizarre just as unusual
as the steering wheel is the paddle
shifters which are kind of strange first
off they're mounted to the column and
fixed in place that's weird because most
cars have paddles that move with the
steering wheel but in the 3008 they're
fixed to the steering column like in an
exotic sports car where the driver may
be on a race track and want to use the
paddles in a corner the unusual thing
about the paddle shifters is though that
they don't paddle when you go to up
shift or downshift you can see the whole
paddle doesn't actually move instead
only this little silver bit at the end
moves the rest of it is fixed in place
which is very unusual i've never really
seen that before another weird item in
the 3008 is cruise control which comes
off a stock from the steering column
like the wipers of the turn signals
that's strange but that's not the weird
part this car also has a rather unusual
cruise control mode you can see over on
the column stock there's something there
called limit if you set it to limit this
car will read and detect speed limit
signs while you're driving down the road
and the adaptive cruise control will
speed up or slow down depending on the
size so if you have it in limit cruise
control mode and you're in a 60 zone and
it turns into a 40 zone the car will
recognize the speed limit change and it
will slow down automatically so you
aren't going over the speed limit next
up moving to the left of the steering
wheel a couple of interesting items over
there one there's a little button over

cluster that tells you you have to press

want to open the tailgate also unusual
over there by that tailgate button
there's a little slot the slot is
intended for you to keep a parking

and more cars should have it next we
move on to the gear lever which in this

the brake and then you press this little
button on the left to unlock it then you
can move it you pull it back for drive
you push it forward for reverse and
